Preference.android:summary:
This project is developed as part of Software Engineering Practices (PSE) course at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, Chair of Embedded Systems in Wintersemester 2018/19.
Supervisor: Tanfer Alan
BLELoc team: Christoffer Anselm, Florian Gilges, Anastasiia Zhyliak, Elena Astankow, Lukas Lihotzki
